dcterms:creator: P. Schmidt
A. Reiss
R. Duerichen
C. Marberger
K. Van Laerhoven
dcterms:description: WESAD contains physiological response data from 15 subjects during three sessions of baseline, amusement, and stress. Various physiological measurements are taken using a chest-worn device and a wrist-worn device.
dcterms:title: Wearable Stress and Affect Detection (WESAD)

dcterms:description: The COVID-19 dataset includes 74 biomarkers collected from 375 patient blood samples between January 10 and February 18, 2020, at Tongji Hospital in Wuhan, China, aimed at predicting in-hospital mortality.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Banos
C. Villalonga
R. Garcia
A. Saez
M. Damas
J. A. Holgado-Terriza
S. Lee
H. Pomares
I. Rojas
dcterms:description: The MHEALTH dataset contains data from 10 volunteers performing 12 different physical activities, collected using Shimmer2 wearable sensors, including various physiological measurements.
dcterms:title: MHEALTH dataset
